QUERY: i like to eat spicy food and tour around singapore

HAWKER_RECOMMENDATIONS.dish_name: Ri Ri Hong Mala Xiang Guo
HAWKER_RECOMMENDATIONS.description: A popular spicy dish known for its numbing and spicy flavors, Mala Xiang Guo is a stir-fry dish with a variety of ingredients like meats and vegetables, cooked in a spicy Sichuan peppercorn sauce.
A spicy and savory dish made with fresh oysters fried with eggs and a spicy chili sauce, offering a unique blend of flavors.
While not inherently spicy, this dish can be enjoyed with a spicy chili sauce that complements the tender chicken and fragrant rice.
A noodle dish with a thick, starchy gravy that can be spiced up with chili paste, offering a comforting yet spicy meal.
A spicy and flavorful dish featuring fried oysters with eggs and a spicy chili sauce, perfect for those who love seafood with a kick.

ATTRACTION_RECOMMENDATIONS.description: A futuristic garden featuring massive Supertrees and conservatories filled with diverse plant life. Perfect for families and nature lovers.

ATTRACTION_RECOMMENDATIONS.attraction_name: Marina Bay Sands SkyPark Observation Deck
ATTRACTION_RECOMMENDATIONS.description: Offers breathtaking panoramic views of Singapore's skyline. Ideal for families, business travelers, and photographers.
One of the world's largest observation wheels, providing a bird's-eye view of the city. A must-visit for tourists seeking a unique perspective.
A museum that combines art, science, culture, and technology. It's a must-visit for cultural enthusiasts.
A historic hilltop park with lush greenery, ancient ruins, and scenic walking trails. Perfect for nature lovers and history buffs.
